sections.content: Companies seeking to promote their products and services to other businesses via the Internet will benefit from inPowerSuiteâ€™s robust e-commerce solution. inPowerSuite software is highly scalable and built to provide maximum flexibility for businesses who manage real-time inventories with multiple pricing configurations. panels.title: Application Management
listItems: Self-serve application process for new suppliers or vendors with an on-line renewal process for existing members
Membership Directory: All pertinent contact information (name, phone, address, e-mail) for members. Administration screen allows for maintenance of the directory
Member Message Board: Members view other member message postings, submit requests to the administrator, and receive e-mail notifications
Calendar of Events: Manage and extend a monthly calendar of events and activities for the association
Newsletters: Subscribed as a monthly on-line communication, sent via email or in PDF format
Business News: Important news articles highlighted on the home page with a link to the news page. Articles stored by category
On-line Member Statements: Manage and settle Member monthly statements to include special purchases
